descs:
[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[OnSucceedAttackHead] Randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (5 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 1 [Breath] Count, 1 [Charge] Count, 1 Haste, 1 Offense Level Up, or 1 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

[OnSucceedAttack] Randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (7 times max)

[EnemyKill] Randomly select one of the following effects: 2 [Breath] Count, 2 [Charge] Count, 2 Haste, 2 Offense Level Up, or 2 Defense Level Up. Then, apply the selected effect to 2 random allies next turn

[OnSucceedAttack] Randomly select one of the following effects: [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], or [Sinking]. Then, inflict 1 Potency of the selected effect next turn.
Repeat the above process (2 + (Highest Glut. A-Reson.)) times. (7 times max)

[BeforeAttack] Target loses 10 SP

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets the unit with the Most SP
If the main target's SP is higher than 15, Atk Weight +1
[BeforeAttack] Target loses 10 SP
data.name: Holiday

passiveList.desc:
When this unit has a status effect or a negative effect, and if the main target or the attacker has a positive effect:
- Inflict +1 more [Combustion], [Laceration], [Vibration], [Burst], and [Sinking] Potency to self and enemies with Skill effects or Coin effects
- Gain +1 more [Breath] and [Charge] Count with Skill effects or Coin effects
passiveList.name: Infinite Hatred
